name: Odd Ball
description:
‘Simple’ yet challenging game of observation. Warp your mind and try and find the odd ball out!

Just click on the ball with a symbol that's not part of a matching pair to progress. That’s it! Try for the lowest time.

Best time known is 02:01:491 by JOrbits. Paste a link to a video with a better time in the comments if you can!

Created using three.js for Ludum Dare 38, original project page is here. Though you can support the developer for future creations here, thanks!

Optimized for play on Desktop.
